moongleam fingering version us size e 3 5 mm - twisted tweed sport version us size f 3 75 mm - luster worsted version us size g 4 00 mm - original version us size f 3 75 mm *or use any hook size to obtain gauge * skill level adventurous beginner this pattern is for those who feel comfortable with crocheting and have made a few projects using various skills and techniques skills include making a magic loop crocheting in the round and working basic crochet stitches and a 3 picot cluster notes from the designer a quick and easy project for your holiday decorating * gauge is not crucial to this project however it will affect yardage and size * each snowflake uses approximately 11-15 yds 10-14 m moongleam fingering 12 5 yds/11 5 m twisted tweed sport 11 yds/10 m luster worsted 15 yds/14 m and original version 15 yds/14 m * to make the ties simply weave your tails through the ws up to the center of one 3 picot cluster * the pattern calls for the magic loop but you can also create the base ring by working chain 6 slip_stitch in first chain * the tail of the magic loop is used to tighten up the center hole pattern is worked in the round * click here 10 to watch a video on how to make this ornament designed by kristina smiley you ll receive a digital file only instantly downloadable as a pdf and won t be shipped anything please allow a few minutes for the download link to be emailed to you if the email doesn t arrive within a few minutes just log in to
